sourcesContent: import { useTheme } from "@emotion/react"; import { Box, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import Logo from "../../assets/logo/logo-imagen.png"; // Importa la imagen del logo function Footer() { const { palette: { primary }, } = useTheme(); return ( About Us Contact Us Grading Shipping Terms {/* Agrega tus redes sociales aqu√≠ */} {" "} {/* Icono de Twitter */} Twitter {" "} {/* Icono de Instagram */} Instagram ); } export default Footer;
